name: Fake Out
summary: With a skilled flourish of your weapon, you force an enemy to acknowledge you as a threat.
description:
With a skilled flourish of your weapon, you force an enemy to acknowledge you as a threat. Make an attack roll to Aid the triggering attack. If you dealt damage to that enemy with the same weapon since the start of your last turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to this roll.Traits

Visual: A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.
trigger: An ally is about to use an action that requires an attack roll, targeting a creature within your weapon's first range increment.
